author: thuer
body:
Changed the Interface and Scripts to work with Sherpa 2.2.0

The changes to the Sherpack retrieving method (from frontier to normal cp) https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/11985 are not yet merged, should I cherry-pick the commits to this pull request and update the RelVal fragments?
title: Changed the Hadronizer and scripts to work with Sherpa 2.2.0
